name: Outside (itch) (Terrax_Gomory)
description:
Outside is a game about a person with agoraphobia., made with the intention of spreading the idea that asking for help is not a bad thing when you have mental health issues!

The game was made by Alba Mercadé (https://itch.io/profile/firstdawn) and Borja Urquidi (https://itch.io/profile/terrax-gomory). We hope you like it!
